education.school: Purdue University, Krannert school of Management, West Lafayette
education.description: My days wrestling with Excel sheets at AB InBev planted a seed, but it took some pandemic-induced soul-searching to realize I was obsessed with turning numbers into stories. Purdue became my gateway to data science, calling me across the ocean for ten months of intense learning among brilliant global peers. The cherry on top was landing a coveted Data Scientist role at BCG. From fixing brewery floors in India to New York consulting towers, it's been a wild ride. The takeaway? Never stop learning.

BITS was a blur of Mechanical Engineering, a Finance minor, and leading 32 engineers to build ATVs that could handle anything but my driving. Between the cultural events, parties, and the 'organized chaos' of the BAJA team, I somehow graduated into a dream gig at the Budweiser brewery. It taught me the most important rule: always enjoy the work and the people you do it with.

education.school: St. Mary's Convent Sr. Secondary School, Ujjain
education.description: For 14 years, this place gave me lifelong friends and mentors, even if I was just the kid with 'potential' rather than results. Then came the surprise: I somehow scored the highest in the school during my board exams. That boost was exactly what I needed to navigate India's competitive entrance exams and secure my ticket to BITS Pilani. The takeaway? Confidence is king!

tasks: Built and deployed a predictive analytics model to identify at-risk customers with 80% accuracy, enabling proactive retention campaigns and operational improvements to prevent customer churn

Created Generative AI-powered system to automatically analyze pharmacy order delay patterns, reducing time to identify root causes from >1 hour to less than 5 minutes per case and accelerating operational improvements
Created a machine learning system to predict business interruptions with >70% accuracy using operational patterns, enabling proactive resource planning and reducing operational disruptions by 30%

Led the design and implementation of an explainability model for demand forecasts (using permutation importance), increasing stakeholder trust and improving supply planning and financial decisions for a multi-billion dollar CPG client
Developed proprietary modeling tool to measure incremental business impact from strategic initiatives using a Synthetic Control, informing client market expansion decisions
Built and deployed Gurobi-based network optimization model for national logistics provider, informing infrastructure and workforce strategy with projected $5B in 10-year cost savings
Managed 5-member analytics team to develop Prophet time-series models predicting credit card spend across 1,500+ US firms, achieving 18% WMAPE and outperforming baseline by 6%

Designed AnyLogic simulation of mine-to-port operations to identify bottlenecks and optimize port utilization, delivering recommendations that enabled $10M+ supply chain cost reduction for a major mining company
Predicted early stage alcohol content using regression, boosting Budweiser production line's service level accuracy by 12%
Coordinated cross-functional execution of $500K capital expenditure project, serving as primary liaison between internal departments and external suppliers to ensure on-time delivery

internships.company: Undisclosed Industry Partner (worker safety solutions company)
tasks: Built a deep learning classification model using PyTorch in Python to identify slips, trips, falls, or other events of workers from 15-second accelerometer data to identify potential workplace hazards with 74% precision
Forecasted shipping volumes per shipping lane between ports using ARIMA and ETS models per month achieving a cross-validated MAPE score of 47%
Optimized digital advertising campaigns using demand management techniques, generating $500K in revenue
Introduced automation in the daily reporting routine with VBA programming in Excel increasing productivity by 25%

interests.title: Hiking
interests.description: I love hiking, trekking, and exploring the great outdoors. There's something truly special about being in nature and experiencing its beauty firsthand. I make sure every weekend I do something outdoorsy, whether it's a long hike or a short nature walk. I want to visit all the famous hiking trails in the world, and I have a long list of places I want to explore. Some of my favorite nature spots yet include the Angels's landing in Zion National Park, Old man of Storr in Scotland, and the Kheerganga trek in the Himalayas.

interests.title: Quizzing
interests.description: I got introduced to quizzing by my roommates at BITS and have enjoyed it since. Participating in quiz leagues and trivia nights is always a fun challenge for me. I enjoy the thrill of competing and the joy of learning new facts. Some of my favorite quiz topics include business, science, and pop culture.

interests.title: Cooking
interests.description: Food has a special place in my heart. I enjoy experimenting with new recipes and exploring different cuisines. Cooking is a creative outlet for me, and I love sharing my culinary creations with friends and family. Some of my favorite dishes to make include the staple dal-chawal, chicken tikka, pasta, and traditional Indian curries.
